label: 忌寸
本: Early Japanese History c. 40 B.C.-A.D. 1167,  Part B . Princeton University Press . 1937
説明文: Ranked as No.4 in 684, being given mostly to Chinese and Korean immigrants and their descendants. The title came primarily from the fact that the first ones to receive it assisted the Imbe clan in supervising the work of the Sacred Storehouse (Imikura ). [忌倉]
